thread.title: GEAR UP director resigns from state board
thread.title_full: GEAR UP director resigns from state board

author: Bob Mercer
title: GEAR UP director resigns from state board
text:
Leave a reply 
In a letter to state Rep. Dan Dryden, R-Rapid City, dated Oct. 1, Gov. Dennis Daugaard provided an update to members of the Legislature’s Government Operations and Audit Committee regarding Mid Central Education Cooperative and the South Dakota GEAR UP program. Dryden is the committee chairman. The letter in its final paragraph notes that Stacy Phelps of Rapid City, who was director of the GEAR UP program in South Dakota, has resigned from the state Board of Education because of the ongoing investigations. The letter can be read 2015-10-01 – GOAC letter here. Former Gov. Mike Rounds appointed Phelps to the state board in 2008. This entry was posted in SD Government on
